body:
There are two problems with the instructions provided:
- The user is told to run `helm list` which is not a valid command.
- The user is told to use `dm` to deploy instead of `helm`.

```
jackgr@jackgr-macbookpro:~/gopath/src/github.com/kubernetes/helm> scripts/start-local.sh 
Starting resourcifier...
Starting expandybird...
Starting deployment manager...
Local manager server is now running on :8080

Logging to log

To use helm:

  export HELM_HOST=http://localhost:8080
  ./bin/helm list

To deploy example guestbook:

     ./bin/dm -service=http://localhost:8088 deploy examples/guestbook/guestbook.yaml

jackgr@jackgr-macbookpro:~/gopath/src/github.com/kubernetes/helm> export HELM_HOST=http://localhost:8080
jackgr@jackgr-macbookpro:~/gopath/src/github.com/kubernetes/helm> which helm
/Users/jackgr/gopath/src/github.com/kubernetes/helm/bin/helm
jackgr@jackgr-macbookpro:~/gopath/src/github.com/kubernetes/helm> helm list
No help topic for 'list'
```

milestone.description:
#### Operational CLI Commands

TODO: Milestones do not allow checkboxes to be checked, so we should track these as meta issues, not milestones. Until then, we're marking things as "checked" by striking them through (e.g. ~~done~~)

~~`helm server <command>`~~
- ~~`install`~~

- ~~`uninstall`~~


~~`helm deploy` - @jackgr and @sparkprime~~

~~`helm deployment delete` - @technosophos and @adamreese~~

~~`helm deployment list` - @technosophos and @adamreese~~

~~`helm deployment describe` - @vaikas-google and @michelleN~~
~~- doesn't have to have layout~~

~~`helm deployment get` - @technosophos and @adamreese~~

~~`helm repo` - @jackgr, @vaikas-google and @michelleN~~
- ~~`list`~~
- ~~`add`~~
- ~~`remove`~~
- only public repos will be supported for now

~~`helm chart create`~~

~~`helm chart package`~~

helm chart support - @jackgr and @sparkprime
  - ~~go template support~~
  - ~~expandybird support~~
  - ~~expansion-time dependencies (template -> chart) only~~
  - ~~layout support~~
  - ~~plugable template services~~
  - no go template validation for now

#### Project Quality Improvements

~~1. @vaikas-google to write documentation on managing charts since we punted on
    chart publishing for mvp~~
2. passing automated end to end tests for every Helm client command with 70% coverage.
3. passing unit tests with 70% overall coverage.
4. ~~go report card score of A or better.~~
5. ~~documentation for all actions described above~~
6. ~~getting started guide ("How do I" guide)~~
7. ~~Create an easy way to get prebuilt client binaries~~
8. ~~At release time there will be prebuilt server side components available to download - @adamreese and @jackgr~~
9. ~~Public chart repo - @sparkprime, @runseb and @jackgr~~
  - ~~charts that work~~
  - ~~a process for contribution including how we'll handle CLAs~~

#### Things Not In MVP
1. update application (redeploy)
2. linting charts
3. doctor
4. credentials (punt to gs tooling for publishing)
5. using kubernetes deployments
6. chart
  - no other template formats
  - deployment(run)-time dependencies

In case there is any doubt - this milestone will result in release of a helm version out into the world.
milestone.title: Minimum Viable Product

title: Bogus instructions in scripts/startup-local.sh
